Affix.Name: Resolution of Sojourner
Affix.Desc: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Goblet of the Sojourner
EQUIP_RING.Desc: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Feather of Homecoming
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Crown of Parting
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Heart of Comradeship
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Sundial of the Sojourner
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.
